title-group.article-title: New RANZCP Member benefit – EBSCOhost databases

permissions.copyright-statement: © The Royal Australian and New Zealand College of Psychiatrists 2012
permissions.copyright-holder: The Royal Australian and New Zealand College of Psychiatrists

body.p: RANZCP is pleased to announce the introduction of the following two EBSCOhost databases (MEDLINE with Full Text and Psychology & Behavioral Sciences Collection) as a new member benefit available to all RANZCP members.

sec.title: MEDLINE with Full Text
sec.p: MEDLINE with Full Text provides authoritative medical information on medicine, nursing, dentistry, veterinary medicine, the health care system, pre-clinical sciences, and much more. It provides full text for more than 1450 journals indexed in MEDLINE. This wide-ranging file contains full text for many of the most used journals in the MEDLINE index – with no embargo.

sec.title: Psychology & Behavioral Sciences Collection™
sec.p: Psychology & Behavioral Sciences Collection™ is a comprehensive database covering information concerning topics in emotional and behavioural characteristics, psychiatry and psychology, mental processes, anthropology, and observational and experimental methods.
Members can access these great resources on the RANZCP website: www.ranzcp.org
